metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20409 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In io_identity_cow of io_uring.c, there is a possible way to corrupt memorydue to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-238177383References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
